snippet.title: BlackGate |  Announcement Trailer (Meta Quest)
snippet.description:
Wishlist NOW!:  https://www.meta.com/experiences/blackgate/7096111567178673/

Sign up for Early Access at http://www.funtrainvr.com/blackgate and join our Discord at https://discord.gg/jR8j2f727q

Float into BlackGate, the Zero Gravity multiplayer VR experience blending the strategy of Among Us and the terror and asymmetrical gameplay of Dead by Daylight. Constructed to study the enigmatic Black Knight Satellite, the BlackGate research station has gone dark. One player becomes the evolving alien predator, while others must repair the station and survive. Navigate zero-gravity environments, uncover secrets, and outsmart your alien opponent in this pulse-pounding Meta Quest VR thriller.


ᒷᓭᔑ↸ ᓵ∷ᔑリᓭ ᒷꖎ╎ꖌリ, ᒷꖎ╎ᓭ ↸ᒷᔑリ↸ ꖎ╎ᓵ↸╎ᒲ↸ ᓭ∷╎ꖎꖎリ. ∴╎リ↸ ╎↸リᔑ ᒷ∷リꖌ╎ ᓭ∷リꖎ ᔑリꖌ╎↸↸, ᒷꖎ↸ リᓭ↸∷リ ↸∷リ╎↸リ╎ꖎ╎. ╎リリ↸ ᒷリ↸∷ ꖎリꖎ∷ꖌ╎↸ ꖎ╎↸リリ↸, ∷リ↸リ ꖎリリリ↸ ꖎリ↸∷リ↸↸リリ. ╎リ↸↸ ᔑリリ↸ ꖌリꖌ∷リ, ᔑリ↸↸リ↸∷ ꖌリリリリ, リ↸リリ↸↸リリ ᒷꖌ╎リ↸ ꖎリリ↸リリ
